altTitles.ja: ボクだけ知ってる一宮さん

altTitles.zh-hk: 僅自己知道的一宮同學

altTitles.zh: 只有我知道的一宫同学

description.en: As a guy with no real friends, Nishina has spent months just watching Ichimiya Misumi who sits next to him in class. At first glance, Ichimiya looks like a lonely girl without any special appeal, but only Nishina knows how provocative she can really be. Upon realizing that Nishina is watching her, Ichimiya begins to interact with him in her own unique way. But unbeknownst to Nishina, Ichimiya also seems to be harboring a secret…
description.fr:
N’ayant aucun réel ami, Nishina a passé des mois à regarder sa voisine de classe, Ichinomiya Misumi. À première vue, Ichinomiya ressemble à n’importe quelle fille solitaire sans trait particulier, mais seul Nishina sait à quel point elle peut être sensuelle. Cette dernière réalise que Nishina l’observe, et commence à interagir de manière unique avec lui. Mais ce que Nishina ne sait pas, c’est qu’Ichinomiya semble cacher un secret…  


---

**Links:**  
- [Amazume Ryuta's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ArOgiso)
description.pt-br: Nishina Taradora, um cara sem amigos, passou meses apenas observando Ichinomiya Misumi que senta ao seu lado em sua classe. À primeira vista, Ichinomiya parece uma garota solitária sem nada de especial, mas apenas Nishima sabe de sua provocante sensualidade. Ao perceber que Nishina está a observando, Ichinomiya começa a interagir com ele de sua própria maneira. Mas fora do conhecimento de Nishima, Ichinoyama também parece estar cultivando um segredo...

biography.en:
Entered Waseda University in 1994. His real family name is Nakagawa.

Circle: Jidou Hanbaiki (じどうはんばいき).
